titlestmt.titleproper: Preliminary Guide to the Yale School of Drama Production Script Collection
Yale School of Drama Production Script Collection
titlestmt.author: Compiled by Monica Achen

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 00:00

did.unittitle: Yale School of Drama Production Script Collection
did.abstract: The collection consists of production scripts from the Yale School of Drama, including dramaturgical cut scripts, early scripts, promptbooks, production books, and regular scripts.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Yale School of Drama Production Scripts Collection was housed in the former Drama Library until its transfer to the Robert B. Haas Family Arts Library in 2008.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale School of Drama Production Scripts Collection, Robert B. Haas Family Arts Library, Yale University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of production scripts from the Yale School of Drama, including dramaturgical cut scripts, early scripts, promptbooks, production books, and regular scripts. Individual records for these scripts are also available in Orbis.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Organized into two series: I. Production Scripts. II. Unproduced Scripts.
Arranged chronologically by year of production and then alphabetically by last name of the author or translator within each year.
